mapper.select: select EDU_NUM as eduNo, EDU_TITLE as eduTitle, EDU_SPEC as eduSpec, EDU_CRE as eduCreateDate, EDU_VIEWS as eduViews, EDU_LIKES as eduLikes from Education order by EDU_NUM desc limit #{startIndex}, 6

select EDU_NUM as eduNo, EDU_TITLE as eduTitle, EDU_SPEC as eduSpec, EDU_CRE as eduCreateDate, EDU_VIEWS as eduViews, EDU_LIKES as eduLikes from Education where EDU_SPEC=#{eduSpec} and EDU_NUM!=#{eduNo} order by EDU_VIEWS desc
select count(*) as count from education
